data.title: AmeriCorps Seniors Pathfinder
data.text:
Use our AmeriCorps Seniors Pathfinder tool to easily search for current AmeriCorps Seniors opportunities near you. View Contact Info in each listing to connect with the opportunities youâ€™re interested in. Please also visit our National Service Reports to learn more about AmeriCorps Seniors in your state.

Last Updated: April 2024, Next Update: July 2024

AmeriCorps Seniors Pathfinder

Displaying page 1 of 249

Search

Search by State and Area

Lifespan of Greater Rochester Inc.

Program name

Lifespan of Greater Rochester - Respite Project

Areas served

Oneida, Cortland, Tompkins, Jefferson, Herkimer, Lewis

Phone number

585-244-8400

The Senior Demonstration Program makes grants that demonstrate innovative activities involving older Americans as volunteers such as linking youth groups and older American organizations in volunteer activities involving older volunteers in programs and activities different from programs and activities supported in the community and testing whether older American volunteer programs may contribute to new objectives or certain national priorities.
